name: ScareMe
0:
”Alexa, ask scare me to tell me a scary story”
”Alexa, ask scare me to tell me a story”
”Alexa, ask scare me to give me a story”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scare me
des: In the mood for a quick scary story? Just ask. Alexa will give you a short, two sentence story to give you the creeps.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
